title: Кот Басик
overview: A very ordinary young programmer has a very unusual cat named Basik. He is endowed with supernatural intelligence. However, this does not surprise anyone. In the modern world, it is not customary to be surprised. And in vain! After all, Basik is a truly amazing cat. He is smart, reserved, caring and, what's more, a real gentleman. His funny adventures and cunning tricks will surprise and amuse not only the owner, but also the audience!
